Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS#, COUNT(CC.COLLABORATOR_ID) AS COLLABORATORS FROM ${mainschema}.CONCERTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.VIEWERS V ON C.CONCERT_ID = V.CONCERT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.PLACES P ON C.PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.ARTISTS A ON C.ARTIST_ID = A.ARTIST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.COLLABORATORS_CONCERTS CC ON C.CONCERT_ID = CC.CONCERT_ID #WHERE# GROUP BY #COLUMNS# ORDER BY V.COUNT_VIEWERS DESC
